title: Asset Hub
description: Manage your global character and location assets
modelHint: Asset Hub uses default models. To change settings, go to
emptyStateHint: Click the buttons above to add characters or locations
confirmDeleteFolder: Delete this folder? Assets inside will be moved to uncategorized.
confirmDeleteCharacter: Delete this character? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteLocation: Delete this location? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteVoice: Delete this voice? This action cannot be undone.
voicePickerEmpty: No voices yet. Please create a voice first.
voiceDesignSaved: AI-designed voice has been set for {name}

modal.aiDesignPlaceholder: e.g., A beautiful woman in a red traditional dress with flowing long hair
modal.aiDesignLocationPlaceholder: e.g., A classical Chinese garden with rockery and pavilions
modal.aiDesignTip: AI will generate a detailed description based on your input. You can edit it after generation.
modal.aiDesignLocationTip: AI will generate a detailed scene description based on your input
modal.descPlaceholder: Describe the character's appearance, clothing, hairstyle, etc...
modal.locationSummaryPlaceholder: Describe the environment, atmosphere, features, etc...
modal.referenceUploadTip: Upload a character image, AI will convert it to a three-view design sheet
modal.dropOrClick: Drop image or click to upload
